page.title: 08 FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A TYPICAL GIRL My name is Joanne Brock. I live at Pond Cottage in Vernham Dean. I am 10.For my holiday I go to Cornwall. At school we go for an adventure week but only the older children can go.Once we went to Minehead in Somerset. This year we went to Duporth in Cornwall. At home I own a bicycle. My house has got 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 kitchen 2 lounges 1 utility room, a hall and 2 staircases. We have got 1 cat and lots of fish. Also in the house which has a large modern extention there is an old fireplace and a very old staircase. I go to school every day.In my spare time I play with my friends. At school I like maths and games and country dancing.
